a.title: Return to the homepage on the district site.

div.ul:
"
BOE Past Meetings/Minutes
School Calendars
Board Initiatives
Surveys
School Consolidation Presentation
COVID-19 Timeline

input.value:
[["

DATE

","

COMMUNICATION

"],["

2/28

","

* Parent/Staff Letter New Hartford Public Schools' efforts to minimize the spread of contagious diseases

"],[null,null],["

3/9

","

* Parent/Staff Letter  New Hartford Public Schools continue to monitor info surrounding COVID-19

"],[null,null],["

3/12

","

* Email/Phone Notification: Schools closed beginning Monday, March 16, 2020 until at least March 27, 2020

"],[null,null],["

3/13

","

* COVID-19 Update: Parent/Staff Letter

"],[null,null],["

3/18

","

* COVID-19 Update:  Parent/Staff Letter

"],[null,null],["

3/24

","

* Phone/Email Notification: 

         Governor directs all schools reopen April 20, 2020

         Distance Learning will begin on Monday, March 30, 2020

"],[null,null],["

3/26

","

* Email Notification:

        Distance Learning Plan sent home via email

        Students' Distance Learning Login Information emailed for students in grades PreK-2

"],[null,null],["

3/30

","

* Distance Learning Begins

"],[null,null],["

4/2

","

* School Calendar Update: Parent/Staff Letter 

"],[null,null],["

4/9

","* Phone/Email Notification: Governor directs all schools remain closed until May 20, 2020"]]

div.p:
Brian P. Murphy
Superintendent of Schools
murphyb@newhtfd.org
530 Main St
P.O.Box 315

div.div: The New Hartford Board of Education does not discriminate in any employment practice, education program, or educational activity on the basis of race, color, religious creed, sex, age, national origin, ancestry, marital status, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability (including, but not limited to, intellectual disability, past or present history of mental disorder, physical disability or learning disability), genetic information, or any other basis prohibited by Connecticut state and/or federal nondiscrimination laws.
